name: coderoad-redux-js-demo
description: Coderoad tutorial for using redux with raw javascript
author: Shawn McKay <shawn.j.mckay@gmail.com>

scripts.browserify: browserify src/index.js --extension=.jsx -o dist/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.reload: npm run browserify && npm run browsersync:reload
scripts.setup: npm i && mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p src && touch src/index.js && npm i -g concurrently browser-sync
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others 'npm run build' 'npm run browsersync:start' 'npm run watch'
